description: Attempts to find and decode a base64 string. This will error out if the string is not valid.

inputs.description: An input string or artifact path
inputs.name: input_string

inputs.description: Character to split by. Only applies if split_input is set to True. If blank, defaults to space. Use character name, e.g. 'space', 'colon', 'comma' or the actual character.
inputs.name: split_character

outputs.description: Passthrough of the string that was entered as input_string
